objects.text:
• Premium Textured Tweed Fabric
• Delicate Lace Trim Detailing
• Fitted Blazer & Pencil Skirt
• Versatile 3/4 Length Sleeves

product_details.name: Elegant Tweed Two-Piece Business Suit Set with Lace Trim
product_details.description:
• Premium textured tweed fabric in sophisticated gray pattern
• Classic fitted blazer with delicate lace trim detailing
• Sleek pencil skirt with figure-flattering silhouette
• 3/4 length sleeves for versatile year-round wear
• Professional white cami included for complete ensemble
• Perfect blend of modern style and traditional tailoring
• Knee-length skirt suitable for office and formal occasions
• Decorative trim adds feminine touch to structured design
• Available in sizes to fit various body types
• Easy-care fabric maintains shape throughout the day

banner_details:
This banner showcases a fashion advertisement for a women's tweed suit set. It features a diagonal, geometric split background with overlapping triangular patterns in sophisticated shades. The left section houses the textual information, including a large, bold heading (`heading`), a stylized subheading (`subheading`), a product feature list in bullet form (`description`), and a promotional tagline (`tagline`). The price is prominently displayed using large typography (`price`), followed by a call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with contrasting text (`cta`). On the right side, a model wearing the suit (`product_image`) stands against a soft-toned backdrop with circular accent shapes.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue (#2D3047)
- Soft Beige (#F2EFE9)
- Blush Pink (#EADFD7)
- Muted Rose (#D8B4A0)
- Deep Slate (#3D4265)
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated women's tweed skirt suit in a soft blend of colors, ideal for a polished advertisement banner. The outfit combines muted lavender (#A89BA2), soft cream (#F3EFEA), and a touch of charcoal grey (#4C4A4E) woven into the tweed fabric, giving it both texture and depth. A clean white inner blouse (#FFFFFF) adds brightness and contrast, while cream piping detail accentuates the jacket’s shape. The warm, natural skin tone (#F9D8C1) enhances the ensemble’s elegance. These colors blend seamlessly for a cohesive look while maintaining individual highlights. The palette conveys grace, confidence, and professional charm.
